td.content: s:pt presents with mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words of 3 weeks duration together with mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing. he is a 47 yr old white M bookkeeper. he reports having no more than one drink a day he does not smoke o:Height 177 cm, Weight 61.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.
